content.question: The effect of the anaphora found in lines 1-2 (Nulla...inquietor) may be to

choices.label: focus on the list of troubles that Pliny has encountered in the country
give the text a calming sound that mirrors Pliny’s own feelings
direct the reader’s attention away from Pliny’s feelings in the country
emphasize how free from troubles Pliny feels when he is in the country

content.answer: emphasize how free from troubles Pliny feels when he is in the country

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 2.A: Describe features and functions of stylistic elements in Latin texts.
